# üí∏ [SolDons](https://soldons.vercel.app/)
[![Svelte](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=&message=Svelte&color=black&style=flat&logo=svelte)](https://svelte.dev/)
[![Anchor](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=&message=Anchor&color=black&style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://project-serum.github.io/anchor/)
[![Rust](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=&message=Rust&color=black&style=flat&logo=Rust)](https://www.rust-lang.org/) 
[![TypeScript](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=&message=TypeScript&color=black&style=flat&logo=TypeScript)](https://www.typescriptlang.org/)
[![Solana](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=&message=Solana&color=black&style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://solana.com/)
[![Vercel](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=&message=Vercel&color=black&style=flat&logo=Vercel)](https://vercel.com/)

The One-Click way to start your fundraising, built on top of __[Svelte](https://svelte.dev/)__ and __[Anchor](https://project-serum.github.io/anchor/)__ for __[Solana](https://solana.com/)__ network.
Devnet version - https://soldons.vercel.app/
## ‚öôÔ∏è Install
Install all necessary tools for developing smart-contracts with __[Anchor](https://project-serum.github.io/anchor/)__. On _Windows_ you have to use __WSL__.
Compile smart-contract and then deploy it. Make sure you have sufficient amount of Solanas
```shell
$: anchor build
$: anchor deploy
```
Copy programId from console and insert it in __declare_id macro__ inside _programs/donation-platform/src/lib.rs_
Run build and deploy commands again to save programId. Copy generated __donation_platform.json__ from _target/idl_ to _app/src/lib_ 

Move to _app_ directory and install dependencies. __[pnpm](https://pnpm.io/)__ is recommended to use
```shell
$: cd ./app
$: pnpm i
```

## üöÄ Startup the app
Now you are ready to run the app
```shell
   $: pnpm run dev
```
Open the __[page](http://localhost:3000/)__ and fill free to test

## üõ∞ Deploy
The project is fully configured to be deployed on __[Vercel](https://vercel.com/)__
To deploy just run 
```shell
  $: vercel
```
